description: The online home of “State of the Art,” Farhad Manjoo’s weekly column about how technology is changing business and society.
title: Technology
text:
A column from Farhad Manjoo that examines how technology is changing business and society.
Farhad Manjoo is the “State of the Art” columnist for Business Day, a position he assumed in February 2014.
Before joining The Times, Mr. Manjoo was a technology columnist at The Wall Street Journal. Previously, he was a technology columnist at Slate magazine from 2008 to 2013. He was also a contributing writer at Fast Company from 2009 to 2013.
Mr. Manjoo is the author of "True Enough: Learning to Live in a Post-Fact Society," which was published by Wiley in 2008. He is working on a book about Apple, Amazon, Facebook and Google's efforts to rule the business world.
He is married and has a son and daughter.
